organization.content:

Paragraph: Poor man 's Roman derby in what has been a miserable season for both Rome teams , already eliminated from the Italian and UEFA Cups .

| --- |
| Rome teams |
| Italian Cup |
| UEFA Cups |

Note: I'm assuming that "Rome teams" refers to the football clubs from Rome, Italy, such as AS Roma and SS Lazio. Also, "Italian Cup" is a common name for the Coppa Italia, the premier knockout football tournament in Italy.

The only clear organization mentioned is the "Italian Cup," which is a common name for the Coppa Italia, the premier knockout football tournament in Italy.
